'''Until the End of the World''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Quest Domain]] for the {{Quest|Until the End of the World}}. 

It has three "areas," which the player explores in sequential order as the story progresses.

==Gameplay Notes==
* Within the Domain, the team is restricted to the [[Traveler]] and the three trial characters.
* The player's progress will be automatically saved at certain checkpoints.
* The player can pick up healing buffs to restore HP.

==Walkthrough==
===The Mines===
# Follow the path forward
#* Use [[Oracle Pillar]]s to fly across gaps
# Defeat enemies {{Enemy List|Hilichurl;Hilichurl Shooter*2;Rock Shieldwall Mitachurl}}
# Use the [[Toy Bombs and Toytanium|Toy Bomb]] to break the wall
#* [[Exquisite Chest]]
# Dodge the "evil dragon"'s attacks
#* After the dragon smashes the ground, the player is teleported to "The Town" ''(unofficial name)''

===The Town===
# Use the [[Gear Sky Ladder]] to go up
# Follow the path forward
# Use the Toy Bomb to destroy the box
# Fix the Oracle Pillar and fly across
#* [[Common Chest]]
# Defeat enemies for Exquisite Chest
#* Wave 1: {{Enemy List|Hilichurl Berserker*2;Hilichurl Shooter*2;Rock Shield Hilichurl Guard}}
#* Wave 2: {{Enemy List|Hydro Samachurl;Anemo Hilichurl Rogue}}
# Pursue the “evil dragon”
#* The player must dodge its various attacks
#* Controls are limited to [[Normal Attack]], [[Jump]], and [[Sprint]]
# Follow Hat Guy into the hole

===The Witch's Study===
# Investigate "Old Journal"
# Investigate "Yellowed Letter"

==Chests==
* Common chest ×1 (after Step 4 in "The Town")
* Exquisite chest ×2 (after Step 3 in "The Mines", Step 5 in "The TownÆ)
